Angular Tag Cloud (v0.3.0)

tag-cloud with default CSS:

<ng-tag-cloud cloud-width="250" cloud-height="250" cloud-data="data"></ng-tag-cloud> //default width and height are 300px;

tag-cloud with custom CSS:

<ng-tag-cloud class="custom-1" cloud-data="data"></ng-tag-cloud>

tag-cloud with overflow enabled:

<ng-tag-cloud cloud-width="150" cloud-height="150" cloud-data="data" cloud-overflow="true"></ng-tag-cloud>

JSON Data Format:

data = [ {text: "Lorem", weight: 15, link: "https://google.com"},
{text: "Ipsum", weight: 9},
{text: "Dolor", weight: 6},
{text: "Sit", weight: 7},
{text: "Amet", weight: 5}
];

Custom CSS:

div.custom-1 {
font-family: "Helvetica", "Arial", sans-serif;
font-size: 10px;
line-height: normal;
}

div.custom-1 a {
font-size: inherit;
text-decoration: none;
}

div.custom-1 span.w10 { font-size: 550%; }
div.custom-1 span.w9 { font-size: 500%; }
div.custom-1 span.w8 { font-size: 450%; }
div.custom-1 span.w7 { font-size: 400%; }
div.custom-1 span.w6 { font-size: 350%; }
div.custom-1 span.w5 { font-size: 300%; }
div.custom-1 span.w4 { font-size: 250%; }
div.custom-1 span.w3 { font-size: 200%; }
div.custom-1 span.w2 { font-size: 150%; }
div.custom-1 span.w1 { font-size: 100%; }

/* colors */

div.custom-1 { color: #09f; }
div.custom-1 a { color: inherit; }
div.custom-1 a:hover { color: #0df; }
div.custom-1 a:hover { color: #0cf; }
div.custom-1 span.w10 { color: grey; }
div.custom-1 span.w9 { color: #0cf; }
div.custom-1 span.w8 { color: #0cf; }
div.custom-1 span.w7 { color: #39d; }
div.custom-1 span.w6 { color: #90c5f0; }
div.custom-1 span.w5 { color: #90a0dd; }
div.custom-1 span.w4 { color: purple; }
div.custom-1 span.w3 { color: green; }
div.custom-1 span.w2 { color: blue; }
div.custom-1 span.w1 { color: red; }

/* layout */

div.ng-tag-cloud {
overflow: hidden;
position: relative;
}

div.ng-tag-cloud span { padding: 0; }

Ported from Lucaong's jQCloud
